reminder.title: Important reminder before paying Zakat:
items: Ensure a full Hijri year (354 days) has passed on your wealth
Pay Zakat to the eight eligible recipients mentioned in the Quran
It is recommended to pay Zakat in Ramadan or the sacred months
Calculate Zakat using the Hijri calendar, not the Gregorian calendar
Verify calculations and consult scholars when in doubt
Intention is important when paying Zakat

explanations.cash: Zakat on cash is due if your total cash savings reach the Nisab threshold and a lunar year has passed.
explanations.gold: Zakat on gold is due if your gold holdings reach the Nisab threshold and a lunar year has passed.
explanations.silver: Zakat on silver is due if your silver holdings reach the Nisab threshold and a lunar year has passed.
explanations.livestock: Zakat on livestock is due if you own the minimum number of animals for a full lunar year.
explanations.agriculture: Zakat on agricultural produce is due at harvest if the amount reaches the Nisab threshold.
explanations.business: Zakat on business assets is due if the value of goods and assets reaches the Nisab threshold for a lunar year.
explanations.investment: Zakat on investments is due if the value of your investments reaches the Nisab threshold for a lunar year.
explanations.rental: Zakat on rental income is due if your net rental income reaches the Nisab threshold for a lunar year.
explanations.income: Zakat on income is due if your total income and savings reach the Nisab threshold for a lunar year.

quran_1.text: And establish prayer and give zakat and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience]

quran_2.text: Charity is only for the poor and the needy and those who work to collect it and those whose hearts are to be reconciled and for [freeing] slaves and for those in debt and for the cause of Allah and for the [stranded] traveler - an obligation [imposed] by Allah. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.

quran_3.text: And those who hoard gold and silver and spend it not in the way of Allah - give them tidings of a painful punishment.

quran_4.text: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned and from that which We have produced for you from the earth.

quran_5.text: And give its due [zakah] on the day of its harvest

quran_6.text: Take, [O Muhammad], from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase

quran_7.text: And whatever you give for zakat, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers.

quran_8.text: And those within whose wealth is a known right for the petitioner and the deprived

quran_9.text: And establish prayer and give zakat and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.

quran_10.text: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakat. And that is the correct religion.
